DOC.brief_title: Interpretation Bias Modification Body Dysmorphic Disorder
DOC.detailed_description: The present study aim examine feasibility remote treatment body dysmorphic disorder deliver via Internet . To evaluate efficacy IBM protocol develop reduce negative appearance evaluative related interpretation , conduct two-arm randomized control trial internet . Individuals diagnosis body dysmorphic disorder ( N = 40 ) randomize one two condition : 1 ) IBM 2 ) progressive muscle relaxation . Each condition consist eight 10-25 minute treatment session . Participants complete two session per week four week administer assessment pre-treatment , one week post-treatment 3-month follow-up . We hypothesize : 1 ) IBM lead great reduction BDD symptom PMR condition ; 2 ) IBM lead great reduction depression , anxiety suicidal ideation PMR condition ; 3 ) IBM lead great reduction threat interpretation great increase benign interpretation PMR condition ; 4 ) The effect condition BDD symptom mediate change BDD-related interpretation bias ; 5 ) The effect train IBM condition maintain 3-month follow-up assessment .
DOC.criteria: Current diagnosis Body Dysmorphic Disorder accord DSM5 criterion BDDYBOCS score great equal 20 Fluent English No significant physical defect flaw appearance ( e.g. , disfiguration ) History psychotic disorder , bipolar disorder , borderline personality disorder Current substance use disorder Unstable medication status ( i.e . change medication within last month ) Concurrent psychotherapy appearance concern Active clinically significant suicidality
